email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Breeze, available for a mid-October laycan. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider coming down to the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the laycan window? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concerns about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $48.75 per metric ton. The laycan window is October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.75 is more reasonable, but we’d like to push for $47.50 if possible. Also, can you confirm the demurrage terms? We’d prefer a rate of $15,000 per day pro rata. Looking forward to your response. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I appreciate your counteroffer. After further negotiation, we can agree to $47.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be $15,000 per day pro rata, as requested. Please confirm if we can proceed with these terms. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for accommodating our requests. We agree to the terms: $47.50 per metric ton and $15,000 per day demurrage. Please proceed with the fixture for the MV Ocean Breeze with a laycan of October 15-20. I’ll follow up with the formal charter party shortly. Cheers, John
